query servicePrincipalAdmin ( $accountId:ID! $adminID:ID!) {
	servicePrincipalAdmin ( accountId:$accountId adminID:$adminID ) {
		id
		name
		email
		creationDate
		adminType
		managedRoles {
			role {
				id
				name
				description
				isPredefined
			}
			allowedEntities {
				id
				name
				type
			}
			allowedAccounts
		}
		resellerRoles {
			role {
				id
				name
				description
				isPredefined
			}
			allowedEntities {
				id
				name
				type
			}
			allowedAccounts
		}
	}	
}
